title: Covered Parking Garage, Patio/Balcony, Controlled Access/Gated
posting_body: ['321 East Fairview Avenue, Glendale, CA 91207', 'Comfortable floor plans, thoughtful amenities tailored to make you feel at home from the start, and a dedicated team of professionals are the pillars upon which El Patio Apartments stands.', 'Nestled on East Fairview Avenue, only steps away from the Brand Boulevard, our apartments in Glendale, CA, allow you to navigate the city with ease.', 'Apartment Features:', 'Dishwasher', 'Patio/Balcony', 'Ceiling Fan', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Extra Storage', 'Disposal', 'Community Features:', 'Fitness Center', 'Covered Parking Garage', 'On-Site Management', 'Two Outdoor Pools', 'Elevator', 'Controlled Access/Gated', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
